import React,{ Component } from "react"; import HomePage5 from '../' export default class Blog extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { blog_post : [], news_list : [] }; } static defaultProps = { apiUrl : 'http://localhost/my-app1/' }; componentDidMount = async() =>{ const FormData = require('form-data'); const data2 = new FormData(); data2.append('get_posts', true); data2.append('post_type', 8); const config2 = { method: 'post', url: this.props.apiUrl, headers: {}, data : data2 }; const news_list = await axios(config2); const make_news = []; for(let key in news_list.data.data){ let row = news_list.data.data[key]; make_news.push({ id : row.id, title : row.title, excerpt : row.excerpt }); this.setState({ news_list : make_news }); } } render(){ const{news_list,blog_post}=this.state; return(

{blog_post.title}
